name: HHID
varlab: Assigned Unique Serial Number for IHS3 Baseline Household

name: case_id
varlab: IHS3 Baseline case_id as in IHS3 Public Data

name: PID
varlab: Assigned Unique Serial Number for IHS3 Baseline and IHPS New Members

name: hh_v02
varlab: Put an 'X' for all individuals who are aged under six months or older than exact

name: hh_v03
varlab: Record the ID of the mother/guardian of the child in the household

name: hh_v10
varlab: Height/length measured with child standing or lying down

name: hh_v11
varlab: Was the measurement of the child done in a normal manner or was measurement diff

name: hh_v12
varlab: Ask of the mother/guardian: Does the child participate in a nutrition programme?

name: hh_v13
varlab: Ask of the mother/guardian: Does the child participate in an underfive clinic?

name: hh_v14
varlab: Did child appear to have oedema (swelling that is not normal)?
